rooms.description: A welcoming space with natural light and green elements such as indoor plants.
Eco-friendly living area with sustainable materials, large windows for ventilation, and minimalistic design.
Energy-efficient kitchen designed to maximize natural light and use eco-friendly appliances.
A small dining space integrated with the living room for a seamless flow of space.
Private bedroom located towards the north-east as per Vastu principles, with eco-friendly decor and ample natural light.
Compact bathroom featuring low-flow fixtures for water conservation.
Built-in closet space adjacent to the master bedroom.

openings.details: Large glass door with natural light and a rainwater harvesting system integration.
Small balcony overlooking garden area, promoting cross ventilation.
Energy-efficient windows installed in living room and bedroom for optimal thermal comfort.
Wooden staircase with minimal environmental impact designed to lead to the upper floor.

rooms.description: Cozy library space with a focus on natural lighting and sustainable design elements.
Additional bedroom designed for guests, maintaining energy efficiency and eco-friendly materials.

openings.details: Continuation of the wooden staircase from the ground floor providing a safe and sustainable vertical circulation.
Large windows for maximum natural light in library and guest bedroom, aligning with Vastu principles.
